basic.floral_language:
Echeveria prolifica 
Floriography: lovely, glorious, strong
Echeveria prolifica is a beautiful plant with thick fleshy leaves in blue- green color, closely arranged in a rosette, has a strong reproductive capacity by lateral buds. With adequate light leaves turn slightly red, like a blossoming rose. Has high ornamental value and favored by the public.
Echeveria prolifica likes sunny places, dormant in summer high temperature, shade properly under scattered light. Flowers sometime with flowers.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, yellow flowers
basic.color: Leaf color blue green, when sunny leaf color slightly red

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes adequate light, a short period of dormancy in summer, put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, less water to avoid overgrowing
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once 1-2 monthls in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
